basic.Peptide Name: Recombinant Crassostrea Gigas Defensin (Cg-Def; molluscs, animals)
basic.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Micrococcus lysodeikticus (MIC=0.005-0.01 µM), Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=1.25-2.5 µM), Microbacterium maritypicum (MIC=0.5-1 µM), Bacillus megaterium (MIC>20 µM);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli 363 (MIC=35-20 µM), Vibrio alginolyticus (MIC>20 µM), Salmonella typhimurium (MIC>20 µM).Fungi:Fusarium oxysporum (MIC=9-4.5 µM), Botrytis cinerea (MIC>20 µM), Penicillium crustosum (MIC>20 µM).
